subScenes.name: 寒暄开场
subScenes.description: 熟人相遇，自然开启话题

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey! Long time no see—how’ve you been?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿！好久不见，最近怎么样？

responses.text: I've been good! Just started hiking on weekends.
responses.text_cn: 我挺好的，最近周末开始去徒步了。

responses.text: Not bad! You?
Pretty busy, but can't complain!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体细节回应，避免只说‘还行’

qaPairs.speakerText: Oh wow, hiking? I heard the trails near Blue Mountain are amazing this season.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 哇，徒步？我听说蓝山步道这季特别棒。

responses.text: Yeah! I went last weekend—saw a deer and everything!
responses.text_cn: 对啊！我上周末去了，还看到一头鹿呢！

responses.text: Really? I should check it out.
Totally! You should join me next time.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用细节展示兴趣，推动对话深入

subScenes.name: 深入兴趣
subScenes.description: 围绕共同爱好追问细节

qaPairs.speakerText: Wait, you said you saw a deer? Was it close?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 等等，你说看到鹿了？离得近吗？

responses.text: Yeah, like 10 feet away—I almost screamed!
responses.text_cn: 对，大概十英尺远，我差点叫出来！

responses.text: Not sure, maybe 20 feet?
responses.text_cn: 不太确定，可能二十英尺吧？

responses.text: So close I could see its eyes!
responses.text_cn: 近到我都看清它的眼睛了！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用感官细节增强画面感，吸引对方继续聊

qaPairs.speakerText: That’s insane! Did you take any pics?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太疯狂了！你拍照片了吗？

responses.text: Of course! I’ve got one with the deer in the background—want to see?
responses.text_cn: 当然拍了！有张鹿在背景里的，想看吗？

responses.text: Nah, I forgot my phone.
I did! I’ll text you later.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提出分享，自然延续话题

subScenes.name: 确认共鸣
subScenes.description: 回应对方兴趣，建立情感连接

qaPairs.speakerText: I’m so jealous—I’ve been wanting to hike for months!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我好羡慕啊，我早就想徒步了！

responses.text: You totally should! I’ve got a beginner trail map if you want.
responses.text_cn: 你真该去！我有份新手路线图，要吗？

responses.text: Yeah, it’s super relaxing.
Let’s plan one together next Saturday?

qaPairs.usageNote: 提供具体帮助，把共鸣转化为行动

responses.text: Yeah, I’ll send you the map tonight. What time works for you?
responses.text_cn: 对，我今晚发你。你几点方便？

responses.text: Cool!
Perfect! I’ll bring snacks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体计划巩固关系，避免空泛回应

subScenes.name: 自然收尾
subScenes.description: 礼貌结束对话，留出再会空间

qaPairs.speakerText: I should probably head out—my sister’s waiting in the car.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我该走了，我姐在车里等我。

responses.text: No problem! Let’s grab coffee next week and swap trail pics?
responses.text_cn: 没问题！下周喝咖啡，交换徒步照片？

responses.text: Oh okay, see you around!
Thanks for the map—I’ll message you tomorrow!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用未来计划自然收尾，避免冷场

responses.text: You too! And don’t forget—text me your favorite snack for the hike!
responses.text_cn: 你也是！别忘了，告诉我你最爱的徒步零食！

responses.text: Thanks, you too!
Will do! Catch you soon!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松小任务强化后续联系
